#summary yappi.YFuncStats

= class YFuncStats (v0.82)=

<font face='Courier New'>
<b><i>class</i></b> yappi.<b>YFuncStats</b>
</font>

<font face='Courier New'>

<b>get()</b>
    This method retrieves the current profiling stats.      yappi.get_func_stats() is actually just a wrapper for this function.

<b>add(path, type="ystat")</b>
    This method loads the saved profile stats stored in file <i>"path"</i>. <i>"type"</i> indicates the type of the saved profile stats. Currently only loading from <i>"ystat"</i> format is possible. <i>"ystat"</i> is the current yappi internal format.

<b>save(path, type="ystat")</b>
    This method saves the current profile stats to <i>"path"</i>. <i>"type"</i> indicates the target type that the profile stats will be saved in. Currently only loading from <i>"ystat"</i> format is possible. <i>"ystat"</i> is the current yappi internal format.

    The following are the save formats currently available:

    ||<b> ystat || [http://docs.python.org/3.3/library/profile.html?highlight=pstat#pstats.Stats pstat ] || [http://kcachegrind.sourceforge.net/html/CallgrindFormat.html callgrind ] </b>||

</font>
